messages.message:
Hey team, testing out the email agent feature in chat internally. A couple points of feedback:
1. In the email response, a simple labeling of what the prompt and response are respectively would be helpful. At first glance it's difficult to know which part is the generic copy, prompt, or response
2. Will this feature be integrated with chat history memory feature as well? Doesn't seem to work that way for now
Hi @david.lee thanks for the feedback. Right now, there are no plans to integrate it in chat history memory. cc: @avi on email formatting.

Thanks @Gaurav Saini. Echoing what @Brian said, this is what I tried earlier and the response I got. The chatbot got stuck in a loop and eventually didn't return any response but I got the email in my inbox right away

I think another way this could be improved is response formatting - for example, I asked it to format it in bullet list format and email it to me, and it showed it correctly in the UI but the email came in markdown format. Similar with a JSON output.
